title: Luancher and Home Screen are both black, empty.
body: Two days ago, I started to log in when I found that the launched "page" was just a black screen. The play button still worked fine, but after logging in, the "home" screen of the client was also just a black screen. I can still launch games, access the store, rune pages, etc. but its very weird of off putting...plus i miss all the news and what not that often is on these pages. I've already done 2 re-installs trying to fix it with no luck. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Hey Korenth,

This generally occurs when some settings in your version of Internet Explorer are not properly set! The League client uses IE as a backbone on Windows, so after some updates, it can change your default settings and cause this problem. There are a couple of things you can do to resolve this one! 

First, try syncing your windows clock. This [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq3) can show you how!

Second, make sure your IE isn't set to offline mode.  This could cause the main page to not show up at all! You can refer to this [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq4) for steps on how to verify this!

Lastly, make sure you are using the most up to date security protocols on IE. Recently, most webpages updated to the TLS protocol as the default, so older ones won't work. This [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq4) can show you how to set the protocols properly!

If all else fails, [submit a support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ticket so one of our Techs can help find out why this is happening!

This explains so many things
So what happens when Spartan becomes the main browser for Windows?

Have check all of those steps and everything was in order. I cycled the security settings to default just to make sure nothing else was clicked and still no luck. I have submitted a ticket, including a reference to this thread. Thanks for the help guys!
Hello, what OS are you running? If its windows try resetting your internet explorer settings to default.
